issue_title: [Feature] Add count() method to return todo count without full load
implementation_summary: Added count() method to TodoStorage class that returns the number of stored todos without requiring explicit load() call.
acceptance_criteria_met: count() returns 0 when storage file does not exist
count() returns correct integer count of stored todos
count() raises ValueError for corrupted JSON (consistent with load())
risks_limitations: Current implementation uses len(self.load()) which still deserializes all todos. Future optimization could read file metadata directly.
